== Cotombi (626760) ==
      
Cotombi is a village in the [[Bicholim]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 366.78 hectares and harbouring 128 households with total population of 591 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[SANQUELIM]] is at a distance of 14 km. Male population is 301 and female population is 290. Scheduled Caste Population is 10 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626760<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
